arabicText: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌۭ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ كَبِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
They	will	say,	“Yes,	why	not	–	indeed	a	Herald	of	Warning	did	come	to	us	–	in	response	we	denied	
and	said	‘Allah	has	not	sent	down	anything	–	you	are	not	except	in	a	great	error’.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kaheñ	ge	kyuñ	nahi	be-shak	hamāre	pās	dar	sunāne	wāle	tashreef	lāye	phir	ham	ne	jhutlāya	aur	
kahā	Allah	ne	kuchh	nahi	utāra	tum	to	nahi	magar	badi	gumrāhi	meiñ.

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	will	say,	“Had	we	listened	or	understood,	we	would	not	have	been	among	the	people	of	
hell.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	kaheñ	ge	agar	ham	sunte	ya	samajhte	to	dozakh	waloñ		meiñ	na	hote

englishTranslationText: So	now	they	admit	their	sins!	Therefore	accursed	be	the	people	of	hell!
romanUrduTranslationText: Ab	apne	gunah	ka	iqrār	kiya	to	phitkār	ho	dozakhyoñ	ko.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَأَجْرٌۭ كَبِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText: Indeed	for	those	who	fear	their	Lord	without	seeing	is	forgiveness,	and	a	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	woh	jo	be	dekhe	apne	Rab	se	darte	haiñ	unke	liye	bakhshish	aur	badā	sawāb	hai.

arabicText: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
englishTranslationText:
And	whether	you	speak	softly	or	proclaim	it	
aloud;	He	indeed	knows	what	lies	within	the	
hearts!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	apni	bāt	āahista	kaho	ya	āawāz	se	
woh	to	diloñ		ki	jānta	hai

arabicText: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
What!	Will	He	Who	has	created	not	know?	
Whereas	He	knows	every	detail,	the	All	
Aware!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	woh	na	jāne	jis	ne	paida	kiya?	aur	wohi	
hai	har	bāreeki	jānta	khabar-dār.

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًۭا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	subjected	the	earth	for	you,	
therefore	tread	its	paths	and	eat	from	
Allah’s	sustenance;	and	towards	Him	is	the	
resurrection.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	jis	ne	tumhāre	liye	zameen	rām	
(Tābe’)	kardi	to	iske	rastoñ	meiñ	chalo	aur	
Allah	ki	rozi	meiñ	se	khāo	aur	usi	ki	taraf	
uthna	hai

arabicText: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ
englishTranslationText:
Have	you	become	unafraid	of	the	One	Who	
controls	the	heavens,	that	He	will	not	cause	
you	to	sink	into	the	earth	when	it	trembles?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	tum	us	se	nidar	ho	gaye	jiski	saltanat	
āasmān	meiñ	hai	ke	tumheiñ	zameen	meiñ	
dhañsā	de	jabhi	woh	kāñpti	rahe

arabicText: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًۭا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
englishTranslationText:
Or	have	you	become	unafraid	of	the	One	Who	
controls	the	heavens,	that	He	will	not	send	a	
torrent	of	stones	upon	you?	So	now	you	will	
realise,	how	My	warning	turned	out!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	tum	nidar	ho	gaye	us	se	jiski	saltanat	
āasmān	meiñ	hai	ke	tum	par	pathrāo	bheje	
to	ab	jāno	ge	kaisa	tha	mera	darāna.

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	those	before	them	had	denied	–	
therefore	how	did	My	rejection	turn	out!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak		unse	agloñ	ne	jhutlāya	to	kaisa	
huwa	mera	inkār

arabicText: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍۢ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	did	they	not	see	the	birds	above	them,	
spreading	and	closing	their	wings?	None	
except	the	Most	Gracious	holds	them	up;	
indeed	He	sees	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kya	unhoñ	ne	apne	ūpar	parinde	na	
dekhe	par	phailāte	aur	samet-te	unheiñ	koi	
nahi	rokta	siwa	Rahmān	ke	be-shak		woh	
sab	kuchh	dekhta	hai.

arabicText: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌۭ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ
englishTranslationText:
Or	which	army	do	you	have	that	will	help	
you	against	the	Most	Gracious?	The	
disbelievers	are	in	nothing	except	an	
illusion.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	woh	kaun	sa	tumhāra	lashkar	hai	ke	
Rahmān	ke	muqabil	tumhāri	madad	kare	
kāfir	nahi	magar	dhoke	meiñ

arabicText: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّۢ وَنُفُورٍ
englishTranslationText:
Or	who	is	such	that	will	give	you	sustenance	
if	Allah	stops	His	sustenance?	In	fact	they	persist	in	rebellion	and	hatred.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	kaunsa	aisa	hai	jo	tumheiñ		rozi	de	agar	
woh	apni	rozi	rok	le	balke	woh	sarkash	aur	
nafrat	meiñ	dheet	bane	huwe	haiñ

arabicText: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
So	is	one	who	walks	inverted	upon	his	face	more	rightly	guided,	or	one	who	walks	upright	on	the	
Straight	Path?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	woh	jo	apne	moñh	ke	bal	auñdha	
chale	ziyada	rāh	par	hai	ya	woh	jo	seedha	
chale	seedhi	rāh	par

arabicText: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“It	is	He	Who	created	
you,	and	made	ears	and	eyes	and	hearts	for	you;	very	little	thanks	do	you	offer!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo		wohi	jisne	tumheiñ		paida	kiya	aur	tumhāre	liye	kān	aur	āañkh	aur	dil	banāye	kitna	
kam	haq	mānte	ho

arabicText: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
englishTranslationText: Say,	“It	is	He	Who	has	spread	you	out	in	the	earth,	and	towards	Him	you	will	be	raised.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	faramāo	wohi	hai	jisne	tumheiñ	zameen	meiñ	tumheiñ		phailāya	aur	usi	ki	taraf	uthāye	jāoge
